name: Bomblebees
description:
Bomblebees is a competitive party game that fuses tile-matching puzzle games with top-down Bomber combat. Players battle on top of an interactive puzzle board with a satisfying cast of weapons in fast-paced, online matches.

This game was made as part of UCSC's 2021 Game Design Capstone Series.

FEATURES:
  • Tile-matching puzzle battler: An innovative and satisfying blend of puzzle and real-time combat 
  • Online networking: A Steam account and a couple of friends is all you need to start matching and blasting!
  • Multiple gamemodes/rulesets: 3 standard handcrafted gamemodes , with adjustable parameters to play the way you want
  • Practice Mode/Tutorial: Learn the ropes and practice your skills before going head-to-head with other Bomblers
